item.title: [FLINK-29152] Describe statement resutls is different from the Hive
item.description:
In hive, the results schema is 

+-----------+------------+----------+
| col_name  | data_type  | comment  |
+-----------+------------+----------+
| a         | int        |          |
| b         | string     |          |
+-----------+------------+----------+

but our implementation is 

0: jdbc:hive2://localhost:10000/default> describe sink;
+-------+-------+-------+-------+---------+------------+
| name  | type  | null  |  key  | extras  | watermark  |
+-------+-------+-------+-------+---------+------------+
| a     | INT   | true  | NULL  | NULL    | NULL       |
+-------+-------+-------+-------+---------+------------+

BTW, it's better we can support DESCRIBE FORMATTED like hive does.

+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+-----------------------+
|           col_name            |                     data_type                      |        comment        |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+-----------------------+
| # col_name                    | data_type                                          | comment               |
|                               | NULL                                               | NULL                  |
| a                             | int                                                |                       |
| b                             | string                                             |                       |
|                               | NULL                                               | NULL                  |
| # Detailed Table Information  | NULL                                               | NULL                  |
